product_name: Quiksilver Syncro 2/2 Back-Zip Spring Wetsuit - Men's
long_description: Keep the chill away in the Quiksilver Syncro 2/2mm Back-Zip Spring Wetsuit and enjoy your time on the water to its fullest. Stretchy 2/2mm neoprene forms to your body for a flexible, comfortable fit; flatseam construction prevents chafing. Rear zipper secures fit and features an extra-long zipper pull; soft neoprene gusset prevents zipper abrasion. 2 rip-and-stick tabs at neck seal securely. Chest panel repels wind and water to guard your core warmth. Hand wash the Quiksilver Syncro 2/2mm Back-Zip Spring wetsuit in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: Keep the chill away in the Quiksilver Syncro 2/2mm Back-Zip Spring Wetsuit and enjoy your time on the water to its fullest.
